price: Indeed, in that is a reminder for anyone who has a [mindful] heart or lends an attentive ear.
arabic: إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَذِكۡرَىٰ لِمَن كَانَ لَهُۥ قَلۡبٌ أَوۡ أَلۡقَى ٱلسَّمۡعَ وَهُوَ شَهِيدٞ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
